fields.name: MAXMB
fields.description: This 7-bit field defines the number of the last Message Buffers that will take part in the matching and arbitration processes

fields.name: IDAM
fields.description: This 2-bit field identifies the format of the elements of the Rx FIFO filter table, as shown below

enumeratedValues.name: IDAM_0
enumeratedValues.description: Format A One full ID (standard or extended) per ID filter Table element.

enumeratedValues.name: IDAM_1
enumeratedValues.description: Format B Two full standard IDs or two partial 14-bit extended IDs per ID filter Table element.

enumeratedValues.name: IDAM_2
enumeratedValues.description: Format C Four partial 8-bit IDs (standard or extended) per ID filter Table element.

enumeratedValues.name: IDAM_3
enumeratedValues.description: Format D All frames rejected.

fields.name: AEN
fields.description: This bit is supplied for backwards compatibility reasons

enumeratedValues.name: AEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Abort disabled

enumeratedValues.name: AEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Abort enabled

fields.name: LPRIOEN
fields.description: This bit is provided for backwards compatibility reasons

enumeratedValues.name: LPRIOEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Local Priority disabled

enumeratedValues.name: LPRIOEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Local Priority enabled

fields.name: IRMQ
fields.description: This bit indicates whether Rx matching process will be based either on individual masking and queue or on masking scheme with RXMGMASK, RX14MASK and RX15MASK, RXFGMASK

enumeratedValues.name: IRMQ_0
enumeratedValues.description: Individual Rx masking and queue feature are disabled.For backward compatibility, the reading of C/S word locks the MB even if it is EMPTY.

enumeratedValues.name: IRMQ_1
enumeratedValues.description: Individual Rx masking and queue feature are enabled.

fields.name: SRXDIS
fields.description: This bit defines whether FlexCAN is allowed to receive frames transmitted by itself

enumeratedValues.name: SRXDIS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Self reception enabled

enumeratedValues.name: SRXDIS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Self reception disabled

fields.name: WAKSRC
fields.description: This bit defines whether the integrated low-pass filter is applied to protect the FLEXCAN_RX input from spurious wake up

enumeratedValues.name: WAKSRC_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN uses the unfiltered FLEXCAN_RX input to detect recessive to dominant edges on the CAN bus.

enumeratedValues.name: WAKSRC_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN uses the filtered FLEXCAN_RX input to detect recessive to dominant edges on the CAN bus

fields.name: LPMACK
fields.description: This read-only bit indicates that FLEXCAN is either in Disable Mode or Stop Mode

enumeratedValues.name: LPMACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN not in any of the low power modes

enumeratedValues.name: LPMACK_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN is either in Disable Mode, or Stop mode

fields.name: WRNEN
fields.description: When asserted, this bit enables the generation of the TWRN_INT and RWRN_INT flags in the Error and Status Register

enumeratedValues.name: WRNEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: TWRN_INT and RWRN_INT bits are zero, independent of the values in the error counters.

enumeratedValues.name: WRNEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: TWRN_INT and RWRN_INT bits are set when the respective error counter transition from <96 to >= 96.

fields.name: SLFWAK
fields.description: This bit enables the Self Wake Up feature when FLEXCAN is in Stop Mode

enumeratedValues.name: SLFWAK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN Self Wake Up feature is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: SLFWAK_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN Self Wake Up feature is enabled

fields.name: SUPV
fields.description: This bit configures some of the FLEXCAN registers to be either in Supervisor or User Mode

enumeratedValues.name: SUPV_0
enumeratedValues.description: FlexCAN is in User Mode. Affected registers allow both Supervisor and Unrestricted accesses

enumeratedValues.name: SUPV_1
enumeratedValues.description: FlexCAN is in Supervisor Mode. Affected registers allow only Supervisor access. Unrestricted access behaves as though the access was done to an unimplemented register location

fields.name: FRZACK
fields.description: This read-only bit indicates that FLEXCAN is in Freeze Mode and its prescaler is stopped

enumeratedValues.name: FRZACK_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN not in Freeze Mode, prescaler running

enumeratedValues.name: FRZACK_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN in Freeze Mode, prescaler stopped

fields.name: SOFTRST
fields.description: When this bit is asserted, FlexCAN resets its internal state machines and some of the memory mapped registers

enumeratedValues.name: SOFTRST_0
enumeratedValues.description: No reset request

enumeratedValues.name: SOFTRST_1
enumeratedValues.description: Reset the registers

fields.name: WAKMSK
fields.description: This bit enables the Wake Up Interrupt generation.

enumeratedValues.name: WAKMSK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Wake Up Interrupt is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: WAKMSK_1
enumeratedValues.description: Wake Up Interrupt is enabled

fields.name: NOTRDY
fields.description: This read-only bit indicates that FLEXCAN is either in Disable Mode, Stop Mode or Freeze Mode

enumeratedValues.name: NOTRDY_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN module is either in Normal Mode, Listen-Only Mode or Loop-Back Mode

enumeratedValues.name: NOTRDY_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN module is either in Disable Mode, Stop Mode or Freeze Mode

fields.name: HALT
fields.description: Assertion of this bit puts the FLEXCAN module into Freeze Mode

enumeratedValues.name: HALT_0
enumeratedValues.description: No Freeze Mode request.

enumeratedValues.name: HALT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enters Freeze Mode if the FRZ bit is asserted.

fields.name: RFEN
fields.description: This bit controls whether the Rx FIFO feature is enabled or not

enumeratedValues.name: RFEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: FIFO not enabled

enumeratedValues.name: RFEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: FIFO enabled

fields.name: FRZ
fields.description: The FRZ bit specifies the FLEXCAN behavior when the HALT bit in the MCR Register is set or when Debug Mode is requested at Arm level

enumeratedValues.name: FRZ_0
enumeratedValues.description: Not enabled to enter Freeze Mode

enumeratedValues.name: FRZ_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enabled to enter Freeze Mode

fields.name: MDIS
fields.description: This bit controls whether FLEXCAN is enabled or not

enumeratedValues.name: MDIS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Enable the FLEXCAN module

enumeratedValues.name: MDIS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Disable the FLEXCAN module

fields.name: PROPSEG
fields.description: This 3-bit field defines the length of the Propagation Segment in the bit time

fields.name: LOM
fields.description: This bit configures FLEXCAN to operate in Listen Only Mode

enumeratedValues.name: LOM_0
enumeratedValues.description: Listen Only Mode is deactivated

enumeratedValues.name: LOM_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN module operates in Listen Only Mode

fields.name: LBUF
fields.description: This bit defines the ordering mechanism for Message Buffer transmission

enumeratedValues.name: LBUF_0
enumeratedValues.description: Buffer with highest priority is transmitted first

enumeratedValues.name: LBUF_1
enumeratedValues.description: Lowest number buffer is transmitted first

fields.name: TSYN
fields.description: This bit enables a mechanism that resets the free-running timer each time a message is received in Message Buffer 0

enumeratedValues.name: TSYN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Timer Sync feature disabled

enumeratedValues.name: TSYN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Timer Sync feature enabled

fields.name: BOFFREC
fields.description: This bit defines how FLEXCAN recovers from Bus Off state

enumeratedValues.name: BOFFREC_0
enumeratedValues.description: Automatic recovering from Bus Off state enabled, according to CAN Spec 2.0 part B

enumeratedValues.name: BOFFREC_1
enumeratedValues.description: Automatic recovering from Bus Off state disabled

fields.name: SMP
fields.description: This bit defines the sampling mode of CAN bits at the FLEXCAN_RX

enumeratedValues.name: SMP_0
enumeratedValues.description: Just one sample is used to determine the bit value

enumeratedValues.name: SMP_1
enumeratedValues.description: Three samples are used to determine the value of the received bit: the regular one (sample point) and 2 preceding samples, a majority rule is used

fields.name: RWRNMSK
fields.description: This bit provides a mask for the Rx Warning Interrupt associated with the RWRN_INT flag in the Error and Status Register

enumeratedValues.name: RWRNMSK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Rx Warning Interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: RWRNMSK_1
enumeratedValues.description: Rx Warning Interrupt enabled

fields.name: TWRNMSK
fields.description: This bit provides a mask for the Tx Warning Interrupt associated with the TWRN_INT flag in the Error and Status Register

enumeratedValues.name: TWRNMSK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Tx Warning Interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: TWRNMSK_1
enumeratedValues.description: Tx Warning Interrupt enabled

fields.name: LPB
fields.description: This bit configures FlexCAN to operate in Loop-Back Mode

enumeratedValues.name: LPB_0
enumeratedValues.description: Loop Back disabled

enumeratedValues.name: LPB_1
enumeratedValues.description: Loop Back enabled

fields.name: ERRMSK
fields.description: This bit provides a mask for the Error Interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: ERRMSK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Error interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: ERRMSK_1
enumeratedValues.description: Error interrupt enabled

fields.name: BOFFMSK
fields.description: This bit provides a mask for the Bus Off Interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: BOFFMSK_0
enumeratedValues.description: Bus Off interrupt disabled

enumeratedValues.name: BOFFMSK_1
enumeratedValues.description: Bus Off interrupt enabled

fields.name: PSEG2
fields.description: This 3-bit field defines the length of Phase Buffer Segment 2 in the bit time

fields.name: PSEG1
fields.description: This 3-bit field defines the length of Phase Buffer Segment 1 in the bit time

fields.name: RJW
fields.description: This 2-bit field defines the maximum number of time quanta One time quantum is equal to the Sclock period

fields.name: PRESDIV
fields.description: This 8-bit field defines the ratio between the PE clock frequency and the Serial Clock (Sclock) frequency

fields.name: TIMER
fields.description: TIMER

fields.name: MG
fields.description: These bits mask the Mailbox filter bits as shown in the figure above

enumeratedValues.name: MG_0
enumeratedValues.description: the corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care"

enumeratedValues.name: MG_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked against the one received

fields.name: RX14M
fields.description: These bits mask Mailbox 14 filter bits in the same fashion as RXMGMASK masks other Mailboxes filters (see RXMGMASKRx Mailboxes Global Mask Register )

enumeratedValues.name: RX14M_0
enumeratedValues.description: the corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care"

enumeratedValues.name: RX14M_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked

fields.name: RX15M
fields.description: These bits mask Mailbox 15 filter bits in the same fashion as RXMGMASK masks other Mailboxes filters (see RXMGMASKRx Mailboxes Global Mask Register )

enumeratedValues.name: RX15M_0
enumeratedValues.description: the corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care"

enumeratedValues.name: RX15M_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked

fields.name: TX_ERR_COUNTER
fields.description: Tx_Err_Counter

fields.name: RX_ERR_COUNTER
fields.description: Rx_Err_Counter

fields.name: WAKINT
fields.description: When FLEXCAN is Stop Mode and a recessive to dominant transition is detected on the CAN bus and if the WAK_MSK bit in the MCR Register is set, an interrupt is generated to the Arm

enumeratedValues.name: WAKINT_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: WAKINT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Indicates a recessive to dominant transition received on the CAN bus when the FLEXCAN module is in Stop Mode

fields.name: ERRINT
fields.description: This bit indicates that at least one of the Error Bits (bits 15-10) is set

enumeratedValues.name: ERRINT_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: ERRINT_1
enumeratedValues.description: Indicates setting of any Error Bit in the Error and Status Register

fields.name: BOFFINT
fields.description: This bit is set when FLEXCAN enters 'Bus Off' state

enumeratedValues.name: BOFFINT_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BOFFINT_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN module entered 'Bus Off' state

fields.name: RX
fields.description: This bit indicates if FlexCAN is receiving a message. Refer to .

enumeratedValues.name: RX_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN is receiving a message

enumeratedValues.name: RX_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN is transmitting a message

fields.name: FLTCONF
fields.description: If the LOM bit in the Control Register is asserted, after some delay that depends on the CAN bit timing the FLT_CONF field will indicate "Error Passive"

enumeratedValues.name: FLTCONF_0
enumeratedValues.description: Error Active

enumeratedValues.name: FLTCONF_1
enumeratedValues.description: Error Passive

enumeratedValues.name: FLTCONF_2
enumeratedValues.description: Bus off

fields.name: TX
fields.description: This bit indicates if FLEXCAN is transmitting a message.Refer to .

enumeratedValues.name: TX_0
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN is receiving a message

enumeratedValues.name: TX_1
enumeratedValues.description: FLEXCAN is transmitting a message

fields.name: IDLE
fields.description: This bit indicates when CAN bus is in IDLE state.Refer to .

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: IDLE_1
enumeratedValues.description: CAN bus is now IDLE

fields.name: RXWRN
fields.description: This bit indicates when repetitive errors are occurring during message reception.

enumeratedValues.name: RXWRN_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: RXWRN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Rx_Err_Counter >= 96

fields.name: TXWRN
fields.description: This bit indicates when repetitive errors are occurring during message transmission.

enumeratedValues.name: TXWRN_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: TXWRN_1
enumeratedValues.description: TX_Err_Counter >= 96

fields.name: STFERR
fields.description: This bit indicates that a Stuffing Error has been detected.

enumeratedValues.name: STFERR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence.

enumeratedValues.name: STFERR_1
enumeratedValues.description: A Stuffing Error occurred since last read of this register.

fields.name: FRMERR
fields.description: This bit indicates that a Form Error has been detected by the receiver node, i

enumeratedValues.name: FRMERR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: FRMERR_1
enumeratedValues.description: A Form Error occurred since last read of this register

fields.name: CRCERR
fields.description: This bit indicates that a CRC Error has been detected by the receiver node, i

enumeratedValues.name: CRCERR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: CRCERR_1
enumeratedValues.description: A CRC error occurred since last read of this register.

fields.name: ACKERR
fields.description: This bit indicates that an Acknowledge Error has been detected by the transmitter node, i

enumeratedValues.name: ACKERR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: ACKERR_1
enumeratedValues.description: An ACK error occurred since last read of this register

fields.name: BIT0ERR
fields.description: This bit indicates when an inconsistency occurs between the transmitted and the received bit in a message

enumeratedValues.name: BIT0ERR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BIT0ERR_1
enumeratedValues.description: At least one bit sent as dominant is received as recessive

fields.name: BIT1ERR
fields.description: This bit indicates when an inconsistency occurs between the transmitted and the received bit in a message

enumeratedValues.name: BIT1ERR_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BIT1ERR_1
enumeratedValues.description: At least one bit sent as recessive is received as dominant

fields.name: RWRNINT
fields.description: If the WRN_EN bit in MCR is asserted, the RWRN_INT bit is set when the RX_WRN flag transition from '0' to '1', meaning that the Rx error counters reached 96

enumeratedValues.name: RWRNINT_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: RWRNINT_1
enumeratedValues.description: The Rx error counter transition from < 96 to >= 96

fields.name: TWRNINT
fields.description: If the WRN_EN bit in MCR is asserted, the TWRN_INT bit is set when the TX_WRN flag transition from '0' to '1', meaning that the Tx error counter reached 96

enumeratedValues.name: TWRNINT_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: TWRNINT_1
enumeratedValues.description: The Tx error counter transition from < 96 to >= 96

fields.name: SYNCH
fields.description: This read-only flag indicates whether the FlexCAN is synchronized to the CAN bus and able to participate in the communication process

enumeratedValues.name: SYNCH_0
enumeratedValues.description: FlexCAN is not synchronized to the CAN bus

enumeratedValues.name: SYNCH_1
enumeratedValues.description: FlexCAN is synchronized to the CAN bus

fields.name: BUFHM
fields.description: Each bit enables or disables the respective FLEXCAN Message Buffer (MB32 to MB63) Interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: BUFHM_0
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding buffer Interrupt is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: BUFHM_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding buffer Interrupt is enabled

fields.name: BUFLM
fields.description: Each bit enables or disables the respective FLEXCAN Message Buffer (MB0 to MB31) Interrupt

enumeratedValues.name: BUFLM_0
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding buffer Interrupt is disabled

enumeratedValues.name: BUFLM_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding buffer Interrupt is enabled

fields.name: BUFHI
fields.description: Each bit flags the respective FLEXCAN Message Buffer (MB32 to MB63) interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: BUFHI_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BUFHI_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding buffer has successfully completed transmission or reception

fields.name: BUF4TO0I
fields.description: If the Rx FIFO is not enabled, these bits flag the interrupts for MB0 to MB4

enumeratedValues.name: BUF4TO0I_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BUF4TO0I_1
enumeratedValues.description: Corresponding MB completed transmission/reception

fields.name: BUF5I
fields.description: If the Rx FIFO is not enabled, this bit flags the interrupt for MB5

enumeratedValues.name: BUF5I_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BUF5I_1
enumeratedValues.description: MB5 completed transmission/reception or frames available in the FIFO

fields.name: BUF6I
fields.description: If the Rx FIFO is not enabled, this bit flags the interrupt for MB6

enumeratedValues.name: BUF6I_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BUF6I_1
enumeratedValues.description: MB6 completed transmission/reception or FIFO almost full

fields.name: BUF7I
fields.description: If the Rx FIFO is not enabled, this bit flags the interrupt for MB7

enumeratedValues.name: BUF7I_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BUF7I_1
enumeratedValues.description: MB7 completed transmission/reception or FIFO overflow

fields.name: BUF31TO8I
fields.description: Each bit flags the respective FLEXCAN Message Buffer (MB8 to MB31) interrupt.

enumeratedValues.name: BUF31TO8I_0
enumeratedValues.description: No such occurrence

enumeratedValues.name: BUF31TO8I_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding MB has successfully completed transmission or reception

fields.name: EACEN
fields.description: This bit controls the comparison of IDE and RTR bits within Rx Mailboxes filters with their corresponding bits in the incoming frame by the matching process

enumeratedValues.name: EACEN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Rx Mailbox filter's IDE bit is always compared and RTR is never compared despite mask bits.

enumeratedValues.name: EACEN_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enables the comparison of both Rx Mailbox filter's IDE and RTR bit with their corresponding bits within the incoming frame. Mask bits do apply.

fields.name: RRS
fields.description: If this bit is asserted Remote Request Frame is submitted to a matching process and stored in the corresponding Message Buffer in the same fashion of a Data Frame

enumeratedValues.name: RRS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Remote Response Frame is generated

enumeratedValues.name: RRS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Remote Request Frame is stored

fields.name: MRP
fields.description: If this bit is set the matching process starts from the Mailboxes and if no match occurs the matching continues on the Rx FIFO

enumeratedValues.name: MRP_0
enumeratedValues.description: Matching starts from Rx FIFO and continues on Mailboxes

enumeratedValues.name: MRP_1
enumeratedValues.description: Matching starts from Mailboxes and continues on Rx FIFO

fields.name: TASD
fields.description: This 5-bit field indicates how many CAN bits the Tx arbitration process start point can be delayed from the first bit of CRC field on CAN bus

fields.name: RFFN
fields.description: This 4-bit field defines the number of Rx FIFO filters according to

fields.name: WRMFRZ
fields.description: Enable unrestricted write access to FlexCAN memory in Freeze mode

enumeratedValues.name: WRMFRZ_0
enumeratedValues.description: Keep the write access restricted in some regions of FlexCAN memory

enumeratedValues.name: WRMFRZ_1
enumeratedValues.description: Enable unrestricted write access to FlexCAN memory

fields.name: IMB
fields.description: If ESR2[VPS] is asserted, this bit indicates whether there is any inactive Mailbox (CODE field is either 0b1000 or 0b0000)

enumeratedValues.name: IMB_0
enumeratedValues.description: If ESR2[VPS] is asserted, the ESR2[LPTM] is not an inactive Mailbox.

enumeratedValues.name: IMB_1
enumeratedValues.description: If ESR2[VPS] is asserted, there is at least one inactive Mailbox. LPTM content is the number of the first one.

fields.name: VPS
fields.description: This bit indicates whether IMB and LPTM contents are currently valid or not

enumeratedValues.name: VPS_0
enumeratedValues.description: Contents of IMB and LPTM are invalid

enumeratedValues.name: VPS_1
enumeratedValues.description: Contents of IMB and LPTM are valid

fields.name: LPTM
fields.description: If ESR2[VPS] is asserted, his 7-bit field indicates the lowest number inactive Mailbox (refer to IMB bit description)

fields.name: TXCRC
fields.description: This field indicates the CRC value of the last message transmitted

fields.name: MBCRC
fields.description: This field indicates the number of the Mailbox corresponding to the value in TXCRC field.

fields.name: FGM
fields.description: These bits mask the ID Filter Table elements bits in a perfect alignment

enumeratedValues.name: FGM_0
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care"

enumeratedValues.name: FGM_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked

fields.name: IDHIT
fields.description: This 9-bit field indicates which Identifier Acceptance Filter (see Rx FIFO Structure) was hit by the received message that is in the output of the Rx FIFO

fields.name: CFSM
fields.description: CAN Finite State Machine

fields.name: CBN
fields.description: CAN Bit Number

fields.name: RMP
fields.description: Rx Matching Pointer

fields.name: MPP
fields.description: Matching Process in Progress

enumeratedValues.name: MPP_0
enumeratedValues.description: No matching process ongoing.

enumeratedValues.name: MPP_1
enumeratedValues.description: Matching process is in progress.

fields.name: TAP
fields.description: Tx Arbitration Pointer

fields.name: APP
fields.description: Arbitration Process in Progress

enumeratedValues.name: APP_0
enumeratedValues.description: No matching process ongoing.

enumeratedValues.name: APP_1
enumeratedValues.description: Matching process is in progress.

fields.name: MI
fields.description: These bits mask both Mailbox filter and Rx FIFO ID Filter Table element in distinct ways

enumeratedValues.name: MI_0
enumeratedValues.description: the corresponding bit in the filter is "don't care"

enumeratedValues.name: MI_1
enumeratedValues.description: The corresponding bit in the filter is checked

fields.name: GFWR
fields.description: It determines the Glitch Filter Width
